statements.sql: select `tags`.*, `post_tags`.`post_id` as `pivot_post_id`, `post_tags`.`tag_id` as `pivot_tag_id` from `tags` inner join `post_tags` on `tags`.`id` = `post_tags`.`tag_id` where `post_tags`.`post_id` in ('35')
